meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Quyen Luu Steve Calechman Kevin Scott Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4035.

div.div: (Capt. Warner: I'm Captain Bernhard Warner. The Clue Crew joins me onboard Golden Princess--next on Jeopardy!)

td.p: Quyen Luu, a recent college graduate from Ventura, California
Steve Calechman, a freelance writer and stand-up comedian from Waltham, Massachusetts
Kevin Scott, a graduate student from Columbus, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,800)

tr.td: TIME FOR A PRINCESS CRUISE
HE'S THE MAYOR
LET'S GET READY TO TUMBLE
TV SITCOMS
DOWN MEXICO WAY
FASHION STATEMENTS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Cheryl of the Clue Crew on the Golden Princess.) I\'m on this deck, whose name is from French for "walk" or "stroll."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Cheryl of the Clue Crew on the Golden Princess.) I'm on this deck, whose name is from French for "walk" or "stroll."
